translation.WELCOME: Welcome. What can I do for you?
translation.ADDTOCART: I added "%s" to your shopping cart. You now have %s items of this type in your cart. Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND: I could not find the product %s in our inventory.
translation.ERROR: We have a little problem here
translation.RETRY: Would you like to add another product to the shopping cart?
translation.HELP: I'm going to help you good!
